title: infrastructure
description: Infrastructure objects describe systems, software services, and associated physical or virtual resources.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `infrastructure`.

name.description: The name used to identify the Infrastructure.

description.description: A description that provides more details and context about this Infrastructure potentially including its purpose and its key characteristics.

infrastructure_types.description: This field is an Open Vocabulary that specifies the type of infrastructure. Open vocab - infrastructure-type-ov

aliases.description: Alternative names used to identify this Infrastructure.

kill_chain_phases.description: The list of kill chain phases for which this infrastructure is used.

first_seen.description: The time that this infrastructure was first seen performing malicious activities.

last_seen.description: The time that this infrastructure was last seen performing malicious activities.
